scalability.summary: AI-powered studio enables businesses to create and deploy thousands of immersive 3D/XR experiences at scale from text or images.

customer_pain_points: Creating immersive 3D/XR experiences is complex and requires specialized skills
App downloads create friction for users
Scaling 3D content creation across many SKUs is difficult
solution_how: Provides a no-code/low-code 3D engine for web-based XR commerce
Uses a proprietary AI (VersaAI) to generate 3D assets from text or images
Enables instant creation and deployment of experiences across web, mobile, and headsets

why_now.thesis: All human interaction, physical or online, is inevitably moving to immersive reality.
catalysts: Technological advancements in AI and real-time rendering
Behavioral shift towards immersive digital commerce

data_quality_notes: Funding ask is stated, but no details on use of funds, milestones, or runway are provided.
The document is a high-level pitch and lacks specific metrics on traction, revenue, or user engagement.
